author: Pon Vasanth Arunachalam
text:
Retired professor threatens protest

A retired professor of Madurai Kamaraj University has threatened to stage t a black flag demonstration during the visit of Governor K. Rosaiah to the university next week for convocation.

In a letter to the Registrar, K.V. Jeyaraj, who retired in 2008, claimed the protest was to draw attention of the Governor as the issue with his retirement benefits had not been sorted out despite multiple petitions.
title: Retired Professor threatens black flag protest
